alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 4:05PM CDT until June 13 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Van Zandt County in north central Texas... Northeastern Henderson County in central Texas... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 404 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Canton, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Canton, Chandler, Van, Brownsboro, Edom, Lake Palestine, Redland, Ben Wheeler, Oakland, Walton, Primrose, Pruitt, Tundra, Colfax and Martins Mill. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 526 and 542. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
